RoomSid.description: The SID of the Room resource with the recording to fetch.

Sid.description: The SID of the RoomRecording resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the RoomRecording resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**duration**: The duration of the recording rounded to the nearest second. Sub-second duration tracks have a `duration` of 1 second
**grouping_sids**: A list of SIDs related to the Recording. Includes the `room_sid` and `participant_sid`.
**media_external_location**: The URL of the media file associated with the recording when stored externally. See [External S3 Recordings](/docs/video/api/external-s3-recordings) for more details.

**offset**: The time in milliseconds elapsed between an arbitrary point in time, common to all group rooms, and the moment when the source room of this track started. This information provides a synchronization mechanism for recordings belonging to the same room.
**room_sid**: The SID of the Room resource the recording is associated with.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the RoomRecording resource.
**size**: The size of the recorded track in bytes.
**source_sid**: The SID of the recording source. For a Room Recording, this value is a `track_sid`.
**track_name**: The name that was given to the source track of the recording. If no name is given, the `source_sid` is used.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
